name: FactorAnalysis
functionalRequirements:
## Factor Analysis

### Purpose
Analyze factors contributing to wins and losses.

### Features
- Multi-factor comparison
- Correlation analysis
- Heat map visualization
- Statistical insights

dataRequirements.description: Analyzes factors contributing to wins and losses

technicalDesign:
## Implementation

### Props
- factors: Array of factor data
- correlations: Correlation matrix
- onFactorSelect: Factor selection handler

properties.name: factors
properties.type: Array<{name: string, winRate: number, impact: number, count: number}>
